explanation.overview: 这些形容词都描述'令人愉快的'体验，但在具体情感色彩和适用场景上有所不同。

details.meaning: 令人觉得有趣好笑的，程度较温和
details.example: The clown's antics were amusing to the children.（小丑的滑稽动作让孩子们觉得有趣。）

details.meaning: 引人发笑的，强调幽默效果
details.example: His joke was so funny that everyone laughed out loud.（他的笑话太有趣了，大家都大笑起来。）

details.meaning: 引起兴趣或注意的，不一定会笑
details.example: She gave an interesting talk about space exploration.（她做了一个关于太空探索的有趣演讲。）

details.meaning: 令人愉悦的，带来强烈满足感
details.example: We had a delightful evening at the concert.（我们在音乐会上度过了一个愉快的夜晚。）

details.meaning: 令人满意的，感官或情感上的愉悦
details.example: The garden has a pleasing arrangement of colors.（花园的色彩搭配令人赏心悦目。）

details.meaning: 有幽默感的，刻意制造喜剧效果
details.example: The speaker delivered a humorous speech.（演讲者发表了一场幽默的演讲。）

details.meaning: 提供娱乐的，能吸引注意力
details.example: The movie was highly entertaining.（这部电影非常 entertaining。）

life_examples.amusing: The magician's tricks were amusing.（魔术师的把戏很有趣。）
life_examples.funny: The comedian's routine was really funny.（喜剧演员的表演真的很好笑。）
life_examples.interesting: The documentary was surprisingly interesting.（这部纪录片出奇地有趣。）
life_examples.delightful: The ballet performance was absolutely delightful.（芭蕾舞表演绝对令人愉快。）
life_examples.pleasing: The symphony's melody was very pleasing.（交响乐的旋律非常悦耳。）
life_examples.humorous: The play had many humorous moments.（这部剧有很多幽默的时刻。）
life_examples.entertaining: The circus show was highly entertaining.（马戏表演非常 entertaining。）

life_examples.amusing: Your story about the cat was quite amusing.（你讲的关于猫的故事相当有趣。）
life_examples.funny: That meme you sent was really funny.（你发的那个表情包真的很好笑。）
life_examples.interesting: I find your perspective very interesting.（我觉得你的观点非常 interesting。）
life_examples.delightful: It was delightful to meet your family.（见到你的家人很愉快。）
life_examples.pleasing: The aroma from the kitchen was very pleasing.（厨房飘来的香气很怡人。）
life_examples.humorous: He has a humorous way of telling stories.（他讲故事的方式很幽默。）
life_examples.entertaining: Your travel anecdotes are always entertaining.（你的旅行轶事总是很 entertaining。）

common_errors.correction: ✅ The comedy show was very funny.（注意场合适当性）
✅ The scientific lecture was interesting.（学术内容通常用interesting）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The puppy's attempts to catch its tail were ___.
哪个词最适合描述'精心设计的喜剧表演'？
填空：The ___ color scheme of the room created a calm atmosphere.
